About me

Courses taught (or developed) MATH 1113 Mathematics for General Education MATH 2153 Bio-Calculus This class uses custom materials that have substantially devolved from the inspiring textbook Modeling the Dynamics of Life by Fred Adler. MATH 2313 Calculus I MATH 2753 Technology for Professional Mathematics and Statistics This class uses custom materials that have been developed to introduce software for mathematical typesetting, introductory numerical computing, and introductory symbolic manipulation. MATH 3103 Differential Equations MATH 49/5910 Introduction to Biological Dynamics* MATH 4263/5373 Applied Numerical Analysis* This class limps along using the oldest possible edition of the great book Numerical Analysis by Burden and Faires.
